title: Death by Lime
description: *This is book 5 in the Key West Culinary Cozy Series*Marilyn’s trusted assistant, Kelcie has a secret admirer, who quickly becomes obsessed with the young woman and starts stalking her. When Marilyn and Tiara become frustrated with the lack of results that the police department and the handsome detective Bernard Cortland are producing, the mother-daughter team decides to take matters into their own hands to find, not only the stalker, but a killer who struck too close to home as well. Throw in a bullying ex-boyfriend and a creepy neighbor who can’t mind his own business, and you have a recipe for a madcap adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat!Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the Book 1: Book 2: Book 3: Book 4:
author: Summer Prescott
